A Gentleman residing in the vicinity of n. York,
was desirous of raising some game cocks, and ac-
cordngy despatched his Irish servant to The city to
purchase quantity Of eggs.


The Irishman returned highly pleased with the
success Of his mission and placed the eggs under
hen to hatch. He watched the process OF incubation
with great impatence, and when the future prize
fighters emerged from their oval prisons. he seized
upon one and hastened with joy to exhibit it to his
master.


Master, Master" cried Pat, ounley just look
here %


The Gentleman cast his eyes upon the bird, and
discovered it to be a duck Astonishment and
Indignation prevented him from replying, and Pat
continued.

full articles.headline: THE IRTSHMAN'S GAMECOCK.
full articles.article:
A Gentleman residing in the vicinity of n. York,
was desirous of raising some game cocks, and ac-
cordngy despatched his Irish servant to The city to
purchase quantity Of eggs.


The Irishman returned highly pleased with the
success Of his mission and placed the eggs under

master.


Master, Master" cried Pat, ounley just look
here %


The Gentleman cast his eyes upon the bird, and
discovered it to be a duck Astonishment and
Indignation prevented him from replying, and Pat
continued.
